|controller_num = <!-- Number of controllers --> |chip1 = Genesys Logic;GL850G; |chip2 = Genesys Logic;GL850G; |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|pwr_optional = true |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 3.6 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->

|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |estreldate = 03/2010 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = 600603120503 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B0030W6KAY |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== This device uses two '''[[Genesys Logic]]''' 4-Port USB Hub controllers. The device presents itself as two seperate 05e3:0608 USB hubs to the host system.
Per a device w/ a S/N of '''CZ'''10866827 ('''Belkin''' S/N format)... :There is a single screw under the bottom label (left-middle). :"'''RoHs''' DX-B7PORT Rev1.2/1.0mm" and a date code of '''1012''' (March 2010) is silkscreened on the bottom of the board. :All radial capacitors on the board are '''Canicon''' branded.
==Links of Interest== [http://www.dynexproducts.com/cms/documents/DX-B4PORT-B7PORT_09-0962_QSG_V4_ENG_Final_lr.pdf QSG] (copyright year 2010)
